column4: so i am asking about server edition, it takes a couple of days to install those applications on desktop edition
you can install lamp with tasksel, it will take you less than a couple of minutes
that's just another package to install
you can update from update-manager, it will resume the download.  But you could also use the alternate CD I suppose
and it does not resume when i restart
no, that's just the name for the architecture
I'm using it on my core 2 duo right now :)
then follow the instructions on using it to upgrade
out of curiousity, why do you want to do that?
its an assignment given to us in college
